metadata.name: Many Views Sinet A
metadata.description:
This generative art work is heavily influenced by Karl Sims' "Genetic Images" (1993).

A composite mathematical function made from sines, multiplications, and additions translates the two dimensional information of position at each pixel to a point in the three dimensional color-space of red, green and blue.

These six hundred views are of the one equation, at different points in the infinite X,Y plane.
